name: War Toy Defense
description:
Small project that got a little out of hand and turned into a learning experience. Great course to make a similar game on Udemy, Ben Tristem's course.

Tower Shooter with friendly free and bad camera angles lol... Give it a try! Thank you for playing!

Right Click to change camera angles or press alt. 

Place towers down by left clicking. 

Esc to bring up pause menu
